characterSet.name: Emoji Pictographs
characterSet.description: These are pictographic symbols used in Japanese mobile telephones and web pages.

characterSubsetArray.characterDefinition: MOBILE PHONE WITH RIGHTWARDS ARROW AT LEFT
CLOCKWISE RIGHTWARDS AND LEFTWARDS OPEN CIRCLE ARROWS
CLOCKWISE RIGHTWARDS AND LEFTWARDS OPEN CIRCLE ARROWS WITH CIRCLED ONE OVERLAY
CLOCKWISE DOWNWARDS AND UPWARDS OPEN CIRCLE ARROWS
ANTICLOCKWISE DOWNWARDS AND UPWARDS OPEN CIRCLE ARROWS
ON WITH EXCLAMATION MARK WITH LEFT RIGHT ARROW ABOVE
INPUT SYMBOL FOR LATIN Upper Case LETTERS
INPUT SYMBOL FOR LATIN Lower Case LETTERS
DIAMOND SHAPE WITH A DOT INSIDE
CHART WITH UPWARDS TREND AND YEN SIGN
SIX POINTED STAR WITH MIDDLE DOT
